A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Force Awakens was a safe movie that didn't take risks but this can't be said about The Last Jedi. For surprising me\, at every turn (which is a rarity)\, this film gets all the plaudits from me. 

If I was being super critical\, I didn't like the slowest space chase in history and the pointless casino bit. They added to the pacing issues which clearly ballooned the run time. 

I went in excited and still came out excited so for that\, I love it.
